nodes.text: The Zabrak Tystel was a powerful variant of the heavy blaster pistol. They were highly valued for their impressive power and accuracy and were often the subject weapon for smuggling operations as the demand for them was so high, especially during the time of the Jedi Civil War. It looked very similar to the standard heavy blasters of the time except for the shiny plated golden finish. The Zabrak Tystel Mark III was a more powerful variant.
